mapper.select: select id,id as pId,name from oa_content_type

SELECT t.id, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.update_date as updateDate, t.delflag as delflag, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.name as name, t.publish_state as publishState, t.code as code, t.view_sort as viewSort, t.content_type as contentType, t.count_capacity as countCapacity, t.file_size as fileSize, t.business_object as businessObject, t.description as description, t.display_portal as displayPortal, t.approval_process as approvalProcess, t.news_type as newsType, t.display_portal_company as displayPortalCompany, t.display_switch_company as displaySwitchCompany, t.new_icon_days as newIconDays,
t.tend_id as tendId FROM oa_content_type t where 1=1 AND delflag = 0
and (t.code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{code}),'%') or t.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%') )
limit #{start},#{limit}

SELECT count(t.id) FROM oa_content_type t where 1=1 AND delflag = 0
and (t.code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{code}),'%') or t.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%') )
